description: This file defines the class MockOtaUpgradeCluster, which extends MockCluster, and simulates an OTA upgrade cluster for testing purposes. It manages firmware version data and mock attribute data for testing OTA updates.

classes.name: MockOtaUpgradeCluster
classes.description: A mock class simulating an OTA upgrade cluster for testing purposes, managing firmware version data and attribute responses.

methods.name: MockOtaUpgradeCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the mock OTA upgrade cluster with specific EUI, endpoint ID, and firmware version.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Overrides method to return attribute data based on the attribute ID, particularly the firmware version.

methods.name: getFirmwareVersion
methods.description: Returns the current firmware version stored in the mock cluster.
